lines.text: We must capture a live earth creature, K-9, and take it back with us to Mars. Isn't that a nice assignment? Hmm?

[Just after Marvin the Martian disintegrated a majority of Bugs' hole in the ground]
Hey! How Halloweeny can you get?
Flying saucer for Saturn, Neptune, Jupiter, Venus, the Dog Star and Mars. Now leaving on track five. All aboard!
Oh! Mutiny makes me so angry!
How Buck Rogers can you get?
